summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Tyler Perry's Good Deeds Review Date: 2013/05/23 Store: Tyler Perry (Actor, Director), Gabrielle Union (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['Product Description', "From filmmaker Tyler Perry, Lionsgate's romantic drama GOOD DEEDS tells the story of Wesley Deeds (Perry), a successful, soon-to-be-married businessman who begins to question his predictable life when he offers help to- and eventually falls in love with- a down-on-her-luck single mother struggling to make ends meet.", 'Amazon.com', 'Tyler Perry steps away from his popular character Madea to play a very different role, and the risk pays off. In', 'Good Deeds', ", Perry plays Wesley Deeds, the son of a successful software magnate who's ended up running his father's company along with his undependable brother (Brian White,", 'I Can Do Bad All by Myself', "). He's engaged to marry Natalie (Gabrielle Union,", 'Bring It On', ') in what promises to be a comfortable but dull relationship. By chance in his office building he meets a cleaning woman named Lindsey (Thandie Newton,', 'Crash', "), a single mother whose life is falling apart--and in trying to help her, he discovers that the life he's leading will never bring him happiness.", 'Good Deeds', "suffers from a few overly broad strokes and stays firmly within the boundaries of the romance genre, but despite that it's Perry's most understated and layered movie. Newton is particularly good, grounding the picture in Lindsey's simmering panic, and her interplay with Perry has a lot of heart that carries the movie through some of its more fairy-tale-romance conventions. Union and Phylicia Rashad are also strong; White is a bit over-the-top, but his role is the most melodramatically written. Overall, though,", 'Good Deeds', 'unfolds more subtly than previous Perry films but is more emotionally engaging for it.', '--Bret Fetzer'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Romantic Comedy', 'Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Gabrielle Union, Tyler Perry', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'good-deeds-1', 'Director': 'Tyler Perry', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 12, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tyler Perry, Gabrielle Union', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great movie! It is so good to have a movie that is not inundated with sex and profanity that can be enjoyed by the entire family. Some with call it a "chick flick", but my son even admitted it was "ok". LOL High praise from him. Review Title: Mr. Perry does it again! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: B.A.P.S. Review Date: 2016/09/20 Store: Robert Townsend (Director), Halle Berry (Actor), Martin Landau (Actor) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy Product Description: ["Can two clueless Georgia homegirls with big hearts -- and even bigger hair -- find happiness, fame and thrills in the swank hills of Beverly? Anything is possible when you are B.A.P.'s"] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Darrel Heath, Halle Berry, Bernie Mac, Natalie Desselle Reid, Luigi Amodeo, Martin Landau, Faizon Love, Jay Stern, Robert Townsend, Pierre Edwards, Jonathan Fried, Michael De Luca, Loretha Jones, Troy Beyer, Ian Richardson, A.J. Johnson, Barry Sobel, Mark Burg, Vince CookeDarrel Heath, Halle Berry, Bernie Mac, Natalie Desselle Reid, Luigi Amodeo, Martin Landau, Faizon Love, Jay Stern, Robert Townsend, Pierre Edwards, Jonathan Fried, Michael De Luca, Loretha Jones, Troy Beyer, Ian Richardson, A.J. Johnson, Barry Sobel, Mark Burg, Vince Cooke See more', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1, 1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'NEWL6925DVD', 'Director': 'Robert Townsend', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 31 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 14, 2004', 'Actors': 'Halle Berry, Martin Landau, Ian Richardson, Natalie Desselle Reid, Troy Beyer', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Producers': 'Michael De Luca, Mark Burg, Loretha Jones, Jay Stern', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Writers': 'Troy Beyer', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: No matter how many times I watch this, it always lifts my mood. Too funny and nice clean family entertainment. Review Title: Too funny! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Last Dragon Review Date: 2016/09/20 Store: Taimak (Actor), Vanity (Actor), Michael Schultz (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Celebrate thirty years of BERRY GORDY’S THE LAST DRAGON, now fully remastered in high definition on Blu-ray™. Martial arts student Leroy Green (Taimak) is on a quest to obtain the elusive all-powerful force known as “The Glow.” Along the way, he must battle the evil, self-proclaimed “Shogun of Harlem” – a kung fu warrior also known as Sho’nuff (Julius J. Carry III) – and rescue a beautiful singer (Prince protégée Vanity) from an obsessed record promoter. Combining pulsating music, cutting-edge dancing and the best in non-stop action, BERRY GORDY’S THE LAST DRAGON is kickin’ good fun featuring an amazing Motown soundtrack, including music by Stevie Wonder, The Temptations, Vanity and DeBarge performing their smash hit “Rhythm of the Night .”', 'Amazon.com', 'Get ready for some seriously big hair.', 'The Last Dragon', '--or, to call it by its full title,', "Berry Gordy's the Last Dragon", "--is a stunning example of 1980s camp cinema. One-name kung fu wonder Taimak plays Leroy Green, a.k.a. Bruce Leroy, a humble student of kung fu who has achieved the highest level of skill, but hasn't yet found his inner master. Wandering through the streets of New York in a Chinese peasant outfit, he accidentally becomes the protector of nightclub hostess/video jockey Laura Charles (played by former Prince protégé Vanity, who also costarred in the trash classic", 'Action Jackson', '). She\'s being threatened by a height-challenged mobster who wants her to play his girlfriend\'s video (the girlfriend is something of a Cyndi Lauper look-alike, played by Broadway star Faith Prince). Meanwhile, a man who calls himself Sho\'Nuff, the Shogun of Harlem, wants to kick Leroy\'s ass and prove himself the baddest kung fu master in town. Add to this Leroy\'s smart-mouthed brother Richie (who calls Leroy "the chocolate-covered yellow peril"), a dregs-of-Motown soundtrack (DeBarge is a high point), ninja battles, pseudo-Eastern philosophical babble, and a jaw-dropping club performance by Vanity, and you have a hilarious example of why we\'re all so very glad the \'80s are over. Featuring a bit role by William H. Macy (', 'Fargo', ',', 'Magnolia', ').', '--Bret Fetzer'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Martial Arts', 'Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Vanity, Taimak, Michael Schultz, Last Dragon Corp., Faith Prince, Rupert Hitzig', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MFR043396059856#VG', 'Director': 'Michael Schultz', 'Media Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 3, 2001', 'Actors': 'Taimak, Vanity, Faith Prince', 'Dubbed': 'French, Portuguese', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Georgian, Thai', 'Producers': 'Rupert Hitzig', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great family movie. Teaches us to embrace WHO we are, whoever that might be. (-: Review Title: Blast from the past... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tyler Perry's Boo! A Madea Halloween [DVD] Review Date: 2017/02/25 Store: Tyler Perry (Actor, Director, Producer), Bella Thorne (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['Madea winds up in the middle of mayhem when she spends a hilarious, haunted Halloween fending off killers, paranormal poltergeists, ghosts, ghouls, and zombies while keeping a watchful eye on a group of misbehaving teens.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Patrice Lovely, Will Areu, Ozzie Areu, Tyler Perry, Cassi Davis, Tyler Perry Company, The, Bella ThornePatrice Lovely, Will Areu, Ozzie Areu, Tyler Perry, Cassi Davis, Tyler Perry Company, The, Bella Thorne See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '43449034', 'Director': 'Tyler Perry', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 31, 2017', 'Actors': 'Tyler Perry, Bella Thorne, Cassi Davis, Patrice Lovely', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish', 'Producers': 'Ozzie Areu, Tyler Perry, Will Areu', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Another hilarious movie by Mr. Perry. A little blue, but appropriate for teens and up. A few bits of profanity, but not overboard with it. We truly enjoyed it. Review Title: Too funny... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Get Out [DVD] Review Date: 2017/11/20 Store: Daniel Kaluuya (Actor), Allison Williams (Actor), Jordan Peele (Director, Producer, Writer) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Horror Product Description: ["When Chris (Daniel Kaluuya), a young African-American man, visits his white girlfriend's (Allison Williams) family estate, he becomes ensnared in the more sinister, real reason for the invitation. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behavior as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries lead him to a truth that he could have never imagined. This speculative thriller from Blumhouse (producers of The Visit, Insidious series and The Gift) and the mind of Jordan Peele (Key & Peele) is equal parts gripping thriller and provocative commentary.", 'Bonus Content:', 'Alternate Ending with Commentary by Writer/Director Jordan Peele', 'Alternate Ending with Commentary by Writer/Director Jordan Peele', 'Deleted Scenes with Commentary by Writer/Director Jordan Peele', 'Deleted Scenes with Commentary by Writer/Director Jordan Peele', 'Unveiling the Horror of Get Out', 'Unveiling the Horror of Get Out', 'Q&A Discussion with Writer/Diretor Jordan Peele and the Cast', 'Q&A Discussion with Writer/Diretor Jordan Peele and the Cast', 'Feature Commentary with Writer/Director Jordan Peele', 'Feature Commentary with Writer/Director Jordan Peele', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Genre': 'horror movie, Jordan Peele movie, thriller movie, Horror, movie night, Oscar nominee, DVD movie, buy movie, Blu-ray movie, Blumhouse movie, 4K movie, Mystery & Suspense/Thrillers, Best Picture nominee, digital movie, Mystery & Suspense, rent movie, Academy Award nomineehorror movie, Jordan Peele movie, thriller movie, Horror, movie night, Oscar nominee, DVD movie, buy movie, Blu-ray movie, Blumhouse movie, 4K movie, Mystery & Suspense/Thrillers, Best Picture nominee, digital movie, Mystery & Suspense, rent movie, Academy Award nomi… See more', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Sean McKittrick, Caleb Landry Jones, Catherine Keener, Allison Williams, Jordan Peele, Daniel Kaluuya, Bradley Whitford, Jason Blum, Edward H. MADE IN AMERICA: • Full-Screen Version BOGUS: • Widescreen [16x9 1.85:1] Version • Languages: English & Français • Subtitles: Español.', ']]>'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English (DTS 5.1), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '7 hours and 24 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'WHV1000117613DVD', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '7 hours and 24 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 12, 2010', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: It was a gift and she loved it! Review Title: Love Whoopi! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/10/14 Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium', 'English Dialogue Boost: Low', 'Italiano', '日本語', 'Português', 'Deutsch', 'Español (España)', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Polski', 'Français'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]', 'العربية', 'Čeština', 'Dansk', 'Deutsch', 'Ελληνικά', 'Español (Latinoamérica)', 'Español (España)', 'Suomi', 'Filipino', 'Français', 'עברית', 'हिन्दी', 'Magyar', 'Indonesia', 'Italiano', '日本語', '한국어', 'Bahasa Melayu', 'Norsk Bokmål', 'Nederlands', 'Polski', 'Português (Brasil)', 'Português (Portugal)', 'Română', 'Русский', 'Svenska', 'தமிழ்', 'తెలుగు', 'ไทย', 'Türkçe', '中文（简体）', '中文（繁體）'], 'Directors': ['Maritte Lee Go'], 'Producers': ['Jason Blum', 'Jeremy Gold', 'Marci Wiseman', 'Lisa Bruce', 'Maggie Malina', 'Guy Stodel'], 'Starring': ['Asjha Cooper', 'Fabrizio Guido', 'Craig Tate'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: WOW! I really don't understand the bad reviews. This is a MOVIE, not a cure for what ails amerikkka. Black folks know the jokes and teasing is exactly what happens in our community. That is because from the time we were stolen/kidnapped until now, we have been brainwashed by the status quo to hate and despise our very own skin.
I enjoyed the movie and look forward to watching it with my grandson. He will get a kick out of it. A movie like this, you expect to be a little campy. It is a vampire flick. Period. Those that take issue with anything past that, need to relax and look inward. Somthing inside you is unhappy. IJS Review Title: I ENJOYED IT! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Tyler Perry's Good Deeds Tyler Perry (Actor, Director), Gabrielle Union (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy ['Product Description', "From filmmaker Tyler Perry, Lionsgate's romantic drama GOOD DEEDS tells the story of Wesley Deeds (Perry), a successful, soon-to-be-married businessman who begins to question his predictable life when he offers help to- and eventually falls in love with- a down-on-her-luck single mother struggling to make ends meet.", 'Amazon.com', 'Tyler Perry steps away from his popular character Madea to play a very different role, and the risk pays off. In', 'Good Deeds', ", Perry plays Wesley Deeds, the son of a successful software magnate who's ended up running his father's company along with his undependable brother (Brian White,", 'I Can Do Bad All by Myself', "). He's engaged to marry Natalie (Gabrielle Union,", 'Bring It On', ') in what promises to be a comfortable but dull relationship. By chance in his office building he meets a cleaning woman named Lindsey (Thandie Newton,', 'Crash', "), a single mother whose life is falling apart--and in trying to help her, he discovers that the life he's leading will never bring him happiness.", 'Good Deeds', "suffers from a few overly broad strokes and stays firmly within the boundaries of the romance genre, but despite that it's Perry's most understated and layered movie. Newton is particularly good, grounding the picture in Lindsey's simmering panic, and her interplay with Perry has a lot of heart that carries the movie through some of its more fairy-tale-romance conventions. Union and Phylicia Rashad are also strong; White is a bit over-the-top, but his role is the most melodramatically written. Overall, though,", 'Good Deeds', 'unfolds more subtly than previous Perry films but is more emotionally engaging for it.', '--Bret Fetzer'] {'Genre': 'Romantic Comedy', 'Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Gabrielle Union, Tyler Perry', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'good-deeds-1', 'Director': 'Tyler Perry', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 12, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tyler Perry, Gabrielle Union', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Great movie! prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Tyler Perry's Good Deeds Review Date: 2013/05/23 Store: Tyler Perry (Actor, Director), Gabrielle Union (Actor) Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy Product Description: ['Product Description', "From filmmaker Tyler Perry, Lionsgate's romantic drama GOOD DEEDS tells the story of Wesley Deeds (Perry), a successful, soon-to-be-married businessman who begins to question his predictable life when he offers help to- and eventually falls in love with- a down-on-her-luck single mother struggling to make ends meet.", 'Amazon.com', 'Tyler Perry steps away from his popular character Madea to play a very different role, and the risk pays off. In', 'Good Deeds', ", Perry plays Wesley Deeds, the son of a successful software magnate who's ended up running his father's company along with his undependable brother (Brian White,", 'I Can Do Bad All by Myself', "). He's engaged to marry Natalie (Gabrielle Union,", 'Bring It On', ') in what promises to be a comfortable but dull relationship. By chance in his office building he meets a cleaning woman named Lindsey (Thandie Newton,', 'Crash', "), a single mother whose life is falling apart--and in trying to help her, he discovers that the life he's leading will never bring him happiness.", 'Good Deeds', "suffers from a few overly broad strokes and stays firmly within the boundaries of the romance genre, but despite that it's Perry's most understated and layered movie. Newton is particularly good, grounding the picture in Lindsey's simmering panic, and her interplay with Perry has a lot of heart that carries the movie through some of its more fairy-tale-romance conventions. Union and Phylicia Rashad are also strong; White is a bit over-the-top, but his role is the most melodramatically written. Overall, though,", 'Good Deeds', 'unfolds more subtly than previous Perry films but is more emotionally engaging for it.', '--Bret Fetzer'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Romantic Comedy', 'Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Gabrielle Union, Tyler Perry', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'good-deeds-1', 'Director': 'Tyler Perry', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Dolby, Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Subtitled, Color, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 50 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 12, 2012', 'Actors': 'Tyler Perry, Gabrielle Union', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great movie! It is so good to have a movie that is not inundated with sex and profanity that can be enjoyed by the entire family. Some with call it a "chick flick", but my son even admitted it was "ok". LOL High praise from him. Review Title: Mr. Perry does it again! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: B.A.P.S. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Last Dragon Review Date: 2016/09/20 Store: Taimak (Actor), Vanity (Actor), Michael Schultz (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Celebrate thirty years of BERRY GORDY’S THE LAST DRAGON, now fully remastered in high definition on Blu-ray™. Martial arts student Leroy Green (Taimak) is on a quest to obtain the elusive all-powerful force known as “The Glow.” Along the way, he must battle the evil, self-proclaimed “Shogun of Harlem” – a kung fu warrior also known as Sho’nuff (Julius J. Carry III) – and rescue a beautiful singer (Prince protégée Vanity) from an obsessed record promoter. Combining pulsating music, cutting-edge dancing and the best in non-stop action, BERRY GORDY’S THE LAST DRAGON is kickin’ good fun featuring an amazing Motown soundtrack, including music by Stevie Wonder, The Temptations, Vanity and DeBarge performing their smash hit “Rhythm of the Night .”', 'Amazon.com', 'Get ready for some seriously big hair.', 'The Last Dragon', '--or, to call it by its full title,', "Berry Gordy's the Last Dragon", "--is a stunning example of 1980s camp cinema. One-name kung fu wonder Taimak plays Leroy Green, a.k.a. Bruce Leroy, a humble student of kung fu who has achieved the highest level of skill, but hasn't yet found his inner master. Wandering through the streets of New York in a Chinese peasant outfit, he accidentally becomes the protector of nightclub hostess/video jockey Laura Charles (played by former Prince protégé Vanity, who also costarred in the trash classic", 'Action Jackson', '). She\'s being threatened by a height-challenged mobster who wants her to play his girlfriend\'s video (the girlfriend is something of a Cyndi Lauper look-alike, played by Broadway star Faith Prince). Meanwhile, a man who calls himself Sho\'Nuff, the Shogun of Harlem, wants to kick Leroy\'s ass and prove himself the baddest kung fu master in town. Add to this Leroy\'s smart-mouthed brother Richie (who calls Leroy "the chocolate-covered yellow peril"), a dregs-of-Motown soundtrack (DeBarge is a high point), ninja battles, pseudo-Eastern philosophical babble, and a jaw-dropping club performance by Vanity, and you have a hilarious example of why we\'re all so very glad the \'80s are over. Featuring a bit role by William H. Macy (', 'Fargo', ',', 'Magnolia', ').', '--Bret Fetzer'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Martial Arts', 'Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Vanity, Taimak, Michael Schultz, Last Dragon Corp., Faith Prince, Rupert Hitzig', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo), Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MFR043396059856#VG', 'Director': 'Michael Schultz', 'Media Format': 'Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 3, 2001', 'Actors': 'Taimak, Vanity, Faith Prince', 'Dubbed': 'French, Portuguese', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Chinese, Georgian, Thai', 'Producers': 'Rupert Hitzig', 'Studio': 'Sony Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Great family movie. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a strong preference for family-friendly entertainment, particularly films that are rated PG-13 or lower. Their consistent high ratings (averaging 4.6 to 5.0) reflect an appreciation for romantic comedies and light-hearted comedies, especially those created by Tyler Perry, highlighting a trend towards familiarity and comfort in genres. 

Themes observed in their choices include an attraction to uplifting narratives featuring relatable characters, along with a preference for humorous, clean content that can be enjoyed by a broad audience, including family and children. The sentiment across multiple reviews emphasizes enjoyment of heartwarming stories with minimal explicit content, suggesting a desire for wholesome entertainment.

Quality-wise, the individual shows a recurring inclination toward engaging performances and quality storytelling, as noted by their favorable views on the acting and emotional depth of characters, while remaining price-sensitive by consistently choosing DVDs as their format of choice rather than more expensive digital options.

Lastly, the mix of genres, from romantic comedy to horror, indicates a flexible appreciation for diverse narratives, yet consistently points to the importance of relatability and emotional connection in their viewing experience.

target_interaction.title: NICE PLOT TWIST
target_interaction.text: It is hard to find movies with a plot that hasn't been done to death.  This one has a surprise for you.  I enjoyed it and was impressed to see and ending I didn't expect.  I think you will enjoy it.
description: When three shipwrecked sailors land on an island abandoned except for four sole residents, one sailor starts to question what happened on the island. He must uncover the truth while he battles to save his own life and escape the isle.
